content:
```xml
<repairs>
    DEL_EDGE | rm | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the `TAKES_MEDICATION` relationship between the patient "Isiah14" and the medication "24 HR Glucophage 500 MG Extended Release Oral Tablet," as it contains an ingredient to which the patient is allergic. This addresses the inconsistency by ensuring that the patient does not take a medication containing an allergen.
